```{r}
overview <- targets::tar_read_raw(glue::glue("overview_{cohort}"))

frail_elderly_high_admissions_perc <- overview |>
  dplyr::filter(activity_type == "Admissions") |>
  dplyr::pull(perc)

frail_elderly_high_beddays_perc <- overview |>
  dplyr::filter(activity_type == "Beddays") |>
  dplyr::pull(perc)
```

In 2023/24, `r frail_elderly_high_admissions_perc`% of all emergency admissions and `r frail_elderly_high_beddays_perc`% of all emergency beddays fall under mitigable activity for the Frail Older People (high frailty) cohort.
